CustomField.description:
It is understood that this will only be used during demos, but by adding this field to the object, it gives much more flexibility for people playing around / giving the demo than using custom metadata/custom settings.
(As some reference salesforce ids, and must be generated after data loads this avoids the needs for complex dependent deployments, etc.)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Parameters to send for a demo of this URL Scheme
CustomField.label: Example Params for Demo
